— Deep Learning for Sensor-based Activity Recognition: A Survey , 2018.
The ﬁrst important work using CNNs to HAR was by Ming Zeng, et al in their 2014 paper
Convolutional Neural Networks for Human Activity Recognition using Mobile Sensors . In the
paper, the authors develop a simple CNN model for accelerometer data, where each axis of the
accelerometer data is fed into separate convolutional layers, pooling layers, then concatenated
